price: 100. Nabiyow keenik ixxic: faxemiiy takkay umam kee meqem ma- massowta, Seehadaytow umaamih mangaa kee tet aba marih manga tassokoote way, toysa Qaafiyatah yan Kas-le Maraw Yallak meesita Jannatal taffoofeenimkeh.
arabic: قُل لَّا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡخَبِيثُ وَٱلطَّيِّبُ وَلَوۡ أَعۡجَبَكَ كَثۡرَةُ ٱلۡخَبِيثِۚ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qul lā yastawī al-khabīthu wal-ṭayibu walaw aʿjabaka kathratu al-khabīthi fa-ittaqū al-laha yāulī al-albābi laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
